meanings.definition: Happening or appearing every two weeks.
meanings.sent1: The magazine is published fortnightly, so I can't wait to read the new issue!
meanings.sent2: Our team has a fortnightly meeting to discuss our progress on the project.
meanings.sent3: I always look forward to the fortnightly movie nights with my friends.
meanings.sent4: The fortnightly newsletter keeps us updated on the latest company news.
meanings.sent5: The fortnightly garbage collection helps keep our neighborhood clean and tidy.

meanings.definition: Lasting for a period of two weeks.
meanings.sent1: The fortnightly vacation felt like a nice break from work.
meanings.sent2: The hotel offered a special fortnightly rate for long-term guests.
meanings.sent3: The fortnightly rain showers made the garden bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent4: The fortnightly lunar cycle affects the tides on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The fortnightly pay schedule helps me budget my expenses more effectively.
